## Structure of the book {-}

Chapter \@ref(intro) introduces the concept of version control and its benefits. 
Chapter \@ref(shell) introduces basic command line skills. Chapter \@ref(setup)
deals with setting up git. Chapter \@ref(projects) shows how to set up GitHub
projects using RStudio. Chapter \@ref(tour) gives a tour of GitHub features. 
Chapter \@ref(commands) explores git commands in some detail.
